name: Replication Data for: Vertical size structure is associated with productivity and species diversity in a short-stature grassland: Evidence for the importance of height variability within herbaceous communities
description: This is the replication data associated with our article in our "Journal of Vegetation Science" titled "Vertical size structure is associated with productivity and species diversity in a short-stature grassland: Evidence for the importance of height variability within herbaceous communities". Please see the ReadMe file for details on dataset contents. (2019-06-07)

citation.text: Brown, C., Cahill Jr., J. F. (2019). Vertical size structure is associated with productivity and species diversity in a short-stature grassland: Evidence for the importance of height variability within herbaceous communities. Journal of Vegetation Science
